output.sentences: This rugged landscape has been a home to native peoples for hundreds of years.
Imaginative structures are favored by modern residents.
But ancient peoples found a home here as well, carving impressive spaces from great stone mountains.
These cisterns are specially constructed to prevent evaporation.
The attention to detail in these beautiful carvings is inspiring, and definitely worth exploring on your travels here.
